attributes.additional_details: Within the Labour Party, dissatisfaction among MPs, party members, or trade unions could force a leadership election. This requires significant internal pressure and a viable alternative candidate.
attributes.background: Encourage members of the Labour Party or trade unions affiliated with the party to call for a leadership challenge.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the leadership of the Labour Party are a matter for the Labour Party, not the UK Government or Parliament.
